physical_appearance:The image depicts a television set. It comes with a cabinet that contains a horizontal railing shelf
 below the shelf which supports the television. The television is predominantly black due to its casing
 but it has a grey screen at its sentre. Beside the screen to its right
 there is a remote controller. There are no cracks on the television screen. However
 the paint on the wood of the front right leg of the cabinet has been chipped.
subject_terms_1:brand name objects electronics technology (general associated concept)
subject_terms_2:Brand name products Television Technology
sgcool_label_text:Setron was a household name in Singapore during the 1960s and 1970s. Granted pioneer status by the Singapore Government in 1964
 Setron was the first local company to produce television sets. It was the only television assembly plant in Southeast Asia at the time when it began operations.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image depicts a television set. It comes with a cabinet that contains a horizontal railing shelf, below the shelf which supports the television. The television is predominantly black due to its casing, but it has a grey screen at its sentre. Beside the screen to its right, there is a remote controller. There are no cracks on the television screen. However, the paint on the wood of the front right leg of the cabinet has been chipped.
metadata.subject_terms_1: brand name objects electronics technology (general associated concept)
metadata.sgcool_label_text: Setron was a household name in Singapore during the 1960s and 1970s. Granted pioneer status by the Singapore Government in 1964, Setron was the first local company to produce television sets. It was the only television assembly plant in Southeast Asia at the time when it began operations.
